ingredients: 2 chipotle chiles in adobo, seeded and chopped, plus 1/2 teaspoon of the adobo sauce
1 container (7 ounces) plain 2% fat Greek yogurt
1 mango, peeled, fruit cut off the seed, and cut into 1/2-inch dice (about 1-1/2 cups)
6 scallions, white and light green parts, thinly sliced
2 ripe Hass avocados, halved, pitted, peeled, and cut into 1/2-inch dice
1 pound sushi-grade tuna steak (1-1/2 inches thick)
